anya-e1208n:287: Tathā na sevetha na tassa doso;
anya-e1208n:290: Na tassa doso na sukhaṃ vajeyya,
anya-e1208n:295: Na tassa doso ta labhe tikicchaṃ,
anya-e1208n:482: Medhāya nando thiravāci kheme; (Kavināma gabbha cakkaṃ)
anya-e1208n:485: Dāyato vasato na’nusantāsassa hitesino; (Gāthaddhavisaya paṭiloma yamakaṃ)
anya-e1208n:488: Sakāyanā’nāya’kāsa vāma nā ga ganā’mavā; (Sabbato bhadda bandhanaṃ)
anya-e1208n:497: Iti medhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe dūrenidāne sumedhabrāhmaṇāpadānaparidīpo.
anya-e1208n:510: Sambuddho so itipi arahaṃ tyādinā’bbhuggataṃ taṃ,
anya-e1208n:524: Abbhuggantvā atha himavatā so sumedho tapassi
anya-e1208n:525: Gacchaṃ tesaṃ upari nabhasā vākacīraṃ dhunanno,
anya-e1208n:542: Sajjetuṃ te sapadi muditā sādhavo tassa’daṃsu; ()
anya-e1208n:572: Sambuddhoyaṃ vajatu iti me dīgharattaṃ hitāya; ()
anya-e1208n:579: Sutvā gāthāpadampi na me bhāriyaṃ saṃkilese
anya-e1208n:602: Patvā bodhiṃ ahamiva siyā gotamo nāma buddho; ()
anya-e1208n:604: Tumhe sampassatha iti imaṃ tāpasaṃ saṅghamajjhe
anya-e1208n:611: Bimbā bimbā dharavati piyā hema bimbā bhirāmā
anya-e1208n:619: Assattho te vijayaviṭapī tvañca kho gotamavho
anya-e1208n:621: Pāyāsaggaṃ parivisiya bho tvaṃ sujātāya dinnaṃ
anya-e1208n:622: Bodhiṃ bujjhissasi iti dhuvaṃ bodhimūle nisajja; ()
anya-e1208n:639: Rammaṃ rammaṃ mahīya jaṭilaṃ pupphamuṭṭhīhi katvā
anya-e1208n:644: Tamhā ṭhānā gatasati jane sannisinnassa tassa
anya-e1208n:657: Āvajjesi kati iti sudhī dhammadhātuṃ sahetuṃ; ()
anya-e1208n:662: Nibbinno mā bhavi’ti paṭhamaṃ pāramiṃ’dhiṭṭhahi so; ()
anya-e1208n:677: Ajjhiṭṭhāsi tvamiti matimā pāramiṃ so catutthiṃ; ()
anya-e1208n:700: Sītattaṃ sampharati hi samaṃ vārinā bhāvayeni,
anya-e1208n:702: Ajjhiṭṭhāsi samuti navamiṃ pāramiṃ metta citto; ()
anya-e1208n:705: Majjhattā’yaṃ vasumativadhū hoti dukkhe sukheka vā,
anya-e1208n:706: Evaṃ bho tvaṃ bhava samatulāsantibho’pekkha ko’ti
anya-e1208n:719: Nikkaṅkhā te punapi nagarā nāgarā taṃ upecca
anya-e1208n:724: Mā te rogo bhavi paṭibhayaṃ mā bhavi chambhitattaṃ
anya-e1208n:730: Bodhātvo himavati sakaṃ assamaṃ tāpaso so,
anya-e1208n:748: Iti medhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jitavaṃsadīpe dūrenidāne sumedha tāpasassa mūlapaṇiṭhānaṭṭhapanapavatti paridīpo dutiyo saggo.
anya-e1208n:1043: Dve sīvali ñca samaṇīsu varā surāmā; ()
anya-e1208n:1209: Iti medhānandābhidhānena yatitā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānanda dānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe dūrenidāne bodhisattassa sesapaṇidhātaṭṭhapana pavatti paridīpo tatiyo saggo.
anya-e1208n:1339: Pabbajjituṃ sapariso pavanaṃ jagāma; () (Soṇapaṇḍitacariyaṃ; Iti nekkhamma pārami;)
anya-e1208n:1349: Paññāpajāpatipati riputo mumoca; () (Mahosadhacariyaṃ iti paññā pāramī;)
anya-e1208n:1369: Khantiṃ pavattayi manappitakhantimetto; () (Dhammapāla cariyaṃ; Iti khantipāramī;)
anya-e1208n:1404: Daḷhaṃ adhiṭṭhitavataṃ vata nojahāsi; () (Temiyacariyaṃ; Iti adhiṭṭhāna pāramī;)
anya-e1208n:1414: Mettāya samphari samaṃ paribhāvitāya; () (Ekarājacariyaṃ; Iti mettā pāramī;)
anya-e1208n:1419: Veraṃ averamanupecca rarakkhu’pekkhaṃ; () (Lomahaṃsacariyaṃ; Iti upekkhāka pakāramiṃ)
anya-e1208n:1460: Iti medhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānanda dānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe durenidāne pāramidhammābhisaṅkharaṇa pavatti paridīpo catuttho saggo.
anya-e1208n:1504: Nisajjo paripāsāde so rājā ekadā raho,
anya-e1208n:1592: Yasmā akālo buddhānaṃ tasmā kālaṃ vipassi so; ()
anya-e1208n:1595: Jāyanti jambudīpasmiṃ tasmā dīpaṃ vipassi so; ()
anya-e1208n:1598: Jāyare majjhime dese tasmādesaṃ vipassi so; ()
anya-e1208n:1601: Khantiye brāhmaṇe buddhā kulaṃ tasmā vipassi so; ()
anya-e1208n:1613: Iti medhānandābhidhānenayatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānatidāne jinavaṃsadīpe durenidāne vessantaracariyappabhutidevārādhanā pavatti paridīpo pañcamo saggo.
anya-e1208n:1897: Rañño kathesi supinaṃ atha so narindo,
anya-e1208n:2115: Iti medhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakala kavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe avidurenidāne pacchimabhavika mahābodhi sattuppatti pavattiparidīpo chaṭṭhosaggo.
anya-e1208n:2365: Iti medhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandananidāne jinavaṃsadīpe avidūrenidāne vividhapubbanimittapātubhāvappavatti paridipo. Sattamosaggo.
anya-e1208n:2905: Iti medhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānanda dānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe avidūrenidāne lakkhaṇapaṭiggahaṇa kumārasambharaṇādi pavatti paridipo aṭṭhamo saggo.
anya-e1208n:3156: Iti mbedhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe avidūrenidāne pāṇiggahamaṅakgalussavapavattiparidīpo. Navamo saggo.
anya-e1208n:3336: Yathariva gaṇikaṃ taṃ kañjaniṃ so janindo
anya-e1208n:3396: Iti varamati sutvā tāya gāthaṃ sugītaṃ
anya-e1208n:3491: Alamiti mama vāso handa nikkhamma tamhā
anya-e1208n:3580: Savisamiva pibanto taṃ tuvaṃ ko’si pucchi,
anya-e1208n:3636: Nabhasi khipi sikhaṃ taṃ iccadhiṭṭhāya dhīro
anya-e1208n:3673: Iti medhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakala kavijana hadayānanda dānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe avidūre nidāne mahābhinikkhamana pavattiparidīpo dasamo saggo.
anya-e1208n:3830: Nā go siyā paṭhaminimujjanaṃ ka re
anya-e1208n:3862: Mā kāhase sakha iti dukkaraṃ kharaṃ
anya-e1208n:3983: Vāsaṃ akā vasi mukhato ca nāsato
anya-e1208n:4229: Iti medhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakala kavijana hakayānandadānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe avidurenidāne mahābodhisattassa mahā padhānānuyogappavattiparidīpo ekādasamosaggo.
anya-e1208n:4745: Iti medhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakala kavakijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe avidūre nidāne devaputta mārabala viddhaṃsana pavattiparidīpo dvādasamo saggo.
anya-e1208n:4996: Iti medhānandābhidhānenayatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe avidure nidāne pubbenivāsañāṇadibbacakkhuñāṇādhigama pavattiparidīpo terasamo saggo.
anya-e1208n:5247: Iti medhānandābhidhānenayatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe avidure nidāne mahā bodhisattassa ariyamaggañāṇābhisambodhi samadhigama pavattiparidīpo cuddasamo saggo.
anya-e1208n:5457: Kiṃ tāta kiṃ tāta kimettha jhāyasi
anya-e1208n:5458: Ko te paro kena parājito tuvaṃ; ()
anya-e1208n:5467: Dassāma vo passatha tāta no balaṃ
anya-e1208n:5559: Iti medhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe santikenidāne bhagavato sattasattāhavitikkamappavatti paridīpo paṇṇarasamo saggo.
anya-e1208n:5562: Vikkhāletvā bhagavati mukhaṃ tasmiṃ nisinne sati,
anya-e1208n:5563: Vāṇijjatthaṃ nija janapadā dve bhātikāka vāṇijā
anya-e1208n:5568: Bhante tumhe anubhavatha no bhikkhaṃ paṭiggaṇhiya
anya-e1208n:5571: Sabbe buddhā nahi karatalambhojesu gaṇhanti kho
anya-e1208n:5576: Ekaṃ katvā samuti caturo patte adhiṭṭhāya te
anya-e1208n:5586: Patvā tesaṃ janapadamubho pakkhippa tā dhātuyo
anya-e1208n:5597: Deseyyaṃ kho paṭhamamasamaṃ dhammaṃ imaṃ duddasaṃ,
anya-e1208n:5608: Ācikkhitvā vimati matarī saññāya taṃ dūrato
anya-e1208n:5609: Nibbinditvā katika makaruṃ vaggā samaggā vasī; ()
anya-e1208n:5611: Ñatvā tesaṃ manasi vikatiṃ odissakaṃ samphari
anya-e1208n:5612: Mettaṃ cittaṃ narahari tato phuṭṭhāsamānā vasī,
anya-e1208n:5639: Vassāna’nte pahiṇi muni te bhikkhu disācārikaṃ; ()
anya-e1208n:5654: Rañño vācaṃ sumariya puraṃ rājaggahaṃ pāvisi; ()
anya-e1208n:5661: Bhetvā diṭṭhiṃ ciraparicitaṃ te kassapādī vasī
anya-e1208n:5662: Disvā rājā bhagavati tadā dhammaṃcarante tahiṃ,
anya-e1208n:5677: Uṇhākāraṃ janayi’ti tadā hutvā navo māṇavo,
anya-e1208n:5696: Āramaṃ taṃ parama ruciraṃ satthā paṭiggaṇhiya
anya-e1208n:5698: Tasmiṃ kāle paramamamataṃ ye daḷhamittā ubho
anya-e1208n:5714: Sutvā dhammaṃ adhigami vasī taṃ dhammasenāpatī; ()
anya-e1208n:5716: Dhammassāmī karahaci ubho te sāvakānaṃ mamaṃ
anya-e1208n:5717: Aggaṃ bhaddaṃ yugamiti ime pabyākarotto munī,
anya-e1208n:5722: Buddho hutvā padahiya ciraṃ nissāya rājaggahaṃ,
anya-e1208n:5743: Evaṃ vatvā kapuna saparisaṃ sokāphadāyiṃ tahiṃ
anya-e1208n:5757: Gantuṃ kālo’yamiti adhunā so kāludāyi vasī,
anya-e1208n:5764: Sāyaṃka pāto ahani vivaṭā sabbādisā pākaṭā; ()
anya-e1208n:5769: Dāvaggī te lavamapi manotāpāya vattanti kiṃ; ()
anya-e1208n:5793: Haṃsasseṇika sirasi vajato te bhuyate kiṅkiṇi-
anya-e1208n:5807: Jiṇṇo vuddho mamihapahiṇi tvaṃ daṭṭhukāmo pitā,
anya-e1208n:5821: Taṃ bhuñjanto divasadivase so yojanaṃ yojanaṃ
anya-e1208n:5826: Nānuppatte bhagavati puraṃ no ñātiseṭṭhaṃ kuhiṃ
anya-e1208n:5839: Nissoko so muni parihari sokandhakāraṃ pitu; ()
anya-e1208n:5844: Tumhegantvā paṇamatha jinaṃ vo piṭṭhitāhomै no; ()
anya-e1208n:5864: Vassaṃ vassi nijanakharuciṃ tesaṃ samāje sati; ()
anya-e1208n:5898: Gantvā sīghaṃ khaḷitavacatā putto mahārāja te
anya-e1208n:5916: Uttiṭṭhādiṃ avadi kasugamaṃ gāthaṃ ṭhito vīthiyaṃ
anya-e1208n:5932: Rājā saṅghaṃ sugatapamukhaṃ khajjena bhojjena ca,
anya-e1208n:5944: Taṃ kamaṃ daṭṭhuṃ nanupavisatī’tve’vaṃ vadantī ṭhitā; ()
anya-e1208n:5972: Sīghaṃ jālaṃ vivariya thiyā vīthiṃ vilokentiyā,
anya-e1208n:5974: Pattaṃ bhante haratha vacanaṃ bhatyā na taṃ vyākari; ()
anya-e1208n:5989: Eso tuyhaṃ naraharika pitā iccākaha pakassāhi naṃ; ()
anya-e1208n:5994: Yācassū’ti pahiṇi pituno ñattaṃ dhanaṃ pettikaṃ; ()
anya-e1208n:6001: Dāyajjaṃ me samaṇa dadataṃ atthodhanenā’ti me
anya-e1208n:6018: Sutvā kasuttaṃ puna taditaraṃ sikkhāgarūnaṃ garu-
anya-e1208n:6026: Rañño datvā varamati varaṃ bhuttāsano āsanā-
anya-e1208n:6046: Buddhatthaṃ so gahapati mahāmagge samagge divā-
anya-e1208n:6058: Tesaṃ sīsaharañjalihi mahito sutvāna taṃ sāsanaṃ
anya-e1208n:6060: Iti medhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakala kavijana hadayānandadāna nidāne jinavaṃsadīpe santikeka nidāne bhagavato pakiṇṇaka caritappavatti paridīpo soḷasamo saggo.
anya-e1208n:6298: Yo sadātiya sadā kama taṃ sadā,
anya-e1208n:6310: Vanī janaṃ jetavane vinento; () (Caturakkharika citta yamakaṃ;)
anya-e1208n:6311: Iti medhānandābhidhānanayatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe santike nidāne jetavana vihārālaṅkāra paridīpo sattarasamo saggo.
anya-e1208n:6730: Iti medhānandābhidhānenayatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe santike nidāne pañjavidhabuddhakicca paridīpo aṭṭhārasamoka saggo.
anya-e1208n:6845: Yatana cha phassa cha vedanāti ceko; ()
anya-e1208n:6981: Iti medhānandābhidhānenayatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe santike nidāne bhagavato arahantināmapaññattiyāabhidheya paridīpo ekūnavīsatimoka saggo.
anya-e1208n:7077: Iti medhānandābhidhānenayatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe santikeka nidāne bhagavato kasammāsambuddhoti nāmapaññattiyā abhidheya paridīpo vīsatimo saggo.
anya-e1208n:7511: Iti medhānandābhidhānenayatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe santike nidāne bhagavato vijjācaraṇa sampannoti nāmapaññattiyāabhidheya paridīpo ekavīsatimo saggo.
anya-e1208n:7512: Taṃkho pana bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ evaṃ kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggato itipi so bhagavā sugatoti.
anya-e1208n:7818: Tena so bhuvanattaye sugato siyāti suvissuto; ()
anya-e1208n:7823: Nātho sammā gato tato so sugato; ()
anya-e1208n:7824: Iti medhānandābhidhānena yatināna viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe santikeka nidāne bhagavato sutagoti paññattiyā abhidheya paridīpo. Bāvīsatimo saggo.
anya-e1208n:7825: Taṃkho pana bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ evaṃ kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggato. Itipiso bhagavā lokavidūti.
anya-e1208n:7976: Itimedhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe santikenidāne bhagavatolokavidūti nāmapaññattiyā abhidheyaparidīpo tevīsatimosaggo.
anya-e1208n:7977: Taṃkho pana bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ evaṃ kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggato itipi so bhagavā anuttaro purisadammasārathīti.
anya-e1208n:8133: Itimedhānandābhidhānena yatinā varacite sakalakavijana hadayānanda dānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe santikenidāne bhagavato anuttaro purisadammasārathīti nāma paññattiyā abhidheya paridīpo catubbīsatimosaggo.
anya-e1208n:8134: Taṃkho pana bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ evaṃ kalyāṇekitti saddo abbhuggato itipi sobhagavā satthā devamanussānaṃti.
anya-e1208n:8148: Sabrahmaṃ sanarāmaraṃ sasamaṇaṃ sabrāhmaṇaṃ yohi so
anya-e1208n:8153: Sattānaṃ tasasate vihiṃsati dhiyā siddhatthasāro tato
anya-e1208n:8160: Taṃkho panabhavantaṃ gotamaṃ evaṃkalyāṇe kittisaddo abbhuggato itipiso bhagavā buddhoti.
anya-e1208n:8165: Patto ñāṇabalesu pāpuṇi vasībhāvaṃ sayamabhuka sayaṃ; ()
anya-e1208n:8167: Bodhetā’ti pajāya nibbacanato saccāni so bujjhitā
anya-e1208n:8169: Matyā bujjhanasattiyā mahatiyā yasmā samaṅakgī tato
anya-e1208n:8184: Buddhambhojatibhānano hī bhagavā sāmaṃ pabuddho yato
anya-e1208n:8206: Itimedhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe santikenidāne satthādevamanussānaṃ buddhoti nāmapaññattīnaṃ abhidheya paridīpo pañcavīsatimo saggo.
anya-e1208n:8207: Taṃkho pana bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ evaṃ kalyāṇe kittisaddo abbhuggato itipi sobhagavā bhagavāti.
anya-e1208n:8452: Na devatāhi ca nana yena kenaci racitaṃ,
anya-e1208n:8645: Mataṃ so pibanto vamī te ca bhāge; ()
anya-e1208n:8711: Itimedhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānanda dānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe santikenidāne bhagavā’tināmapaññattiyā abhidheyaparidīpo chabbīsatimo saggo.
anya-e1208n:8786: Itimedhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe santikenidāte navannamarahādiguṇānaṃ saṅkhepanayaparidīpo
anya-e1208n:9096: Na ca taṃ paṭivijjhi neva yāci
anya-e1208n:9129: Appossukko samāno viharatu kalimā ho timāsaccayena
anya-e1208n:9137: Loko sokandhakāre paripati janito bhiṃsano lomahaṃso; ()
anya-e1208n:9138: Itimedhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe santike nidāne bhagavato āyusaṅkhārossajjana pavatti paridīpo aṭṭhavīsatimo saggo.
anya-e1208n:9140: Yenā’nando vasati bhagavā tena gantvā nisinno
anya-e1208n:9142: Bhante sukkhāsati ca elitā hiṃsano lomahaṃso
anya-e1208n:9155: Gabbhokkanto bhacati ca yadā sampajāno satova
anya-e1208n:9158: Ete dhammā samaṇa mahato bhumicālassa hetu; ()
anya-e1208n:9175: Apposasukekā tvamiha kalimā hohi māsehi tīhi
anya-e1208n:9185: Sambodhiṃ tvaṃ yadi bhagavato saddahanto’si kasmā
anya-e1208n:9187: Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sati bhagavatā ka yamāne nimitte
anya-e1208n:9190: Yāceyyāsi yadi dasabalaṃ ce paṭikkhippa vācā
anya-e1208n:9192: Naṇvā’kkhāto samaṇa paṭigacceva me saṅkhataṃ yaṃ
anya-e1208n:9193: Jātaṃ bhūtaṃ avipariṇataṃ taṃ kuto’ pe’ttha labbhā; ()
anya-e1208n:9197: Yāsā vācā yathariva chiyāmuttakhāṇo tathā taṃ
anya-e1208n:9211: Yete dhammā sayamadhigatā desitā sādhukaṃ vo,
anya-e1208n:9228: Oloketvā ida mavaca me pacchimaṃ dassana’nti; ()
anya-e1208n:9235: Tisso sikkhā pariharatha vo sādhukaṃ bhikkhave’ti
anya-e1208n:9245: Eso dhammo bhavati vinayo sāsanaṃ satthu cedaṃ
anya-e1208n:9246: Abbhaññātaṃ vata bhagavato sammukhā me sutanti,
anya-e1208n:9247: Sakkhīkatvā yadi vadati maṃ bhikkhave koci bhikkhu
anya-e1208n:9258: Yvābhiññāto paṭibalataro bhikkhu vā sammukhā me
anya-e1208n:9302: Yaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ narahari tahiṃ vissamatto nisajja,
anya-e1208n:9313: Sakkā bhante savati kakudhāsindhu gattāni sīkiṃ
anya-e1208n:9316: Evaṃ vutte puna bhagavatā codito pattahattho
anya-e1208n:9334: Datvā buddhaṃ saraṇa magamā sāṭakaṃ siṅgīvaṇṇaṃ; ()
anya-e1208n:9347: Dve me laddhā samasamaphalā piṇḍapātā visiṭṭhā,
anya-e1208n:9349: Sse’vaṃ vatvā pariharatu tañcāha me accayena; ()
anya-e1208n:9378: Yo kho dhammaṃ carati samaṇo’ pāsako vā’nudhammaṃ
anya-e1208n:9379: Bhatyā so maṃ paramavidhānā kamānaye pūjayeti; ()
anya-e1208n:9391: Kandantīnaṃ pakiriya sake kesapāse ca bāhā
anya-e1208n:9432: Theraṃ mākhovilapi ala mānanda māsoci hevaṃ,
anya-e1208n:9439: Ātāpī so tvamasi nipapako hesi khīṇāsavoti; ()
anya-e1208n:9457: Rājā hutvā cira manubhaviṃ dhammiko dhammarājā,
anya-e1208n:9468: Uyyānaṃ te pavisiya tadā mallaputtā ca mallā
anya-e1208n:9481: Okāsaṃ me dadatha samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ pucchanāya
anya-e1208n:9483: Vutte satthā kilamati alaṃhāvuso mā vihaññi
anya-e1208n:9496: Paññatto yo bhavati vinayo desito yoca dhammo
anya-e1208n:9497: So vo satthā paramasaraṇo’tyā’ha me accayena,
anya-e1208n:9501: Paccakkho no bhavi dasabalo pucchituṃ sammukhā taṃ
anya-e1208n:9504: Saṅghe magge vimati yadivo bhikkhave pucchathāti; ()
anya-e1208n:9506: Yasmā khandhe pajahati jino bhikkhave bhandadāni
anya-e1208n:9516: Taṃ taṃ jhānaṃ muni paṭisamāpajjamāno nirodhā
anya-e1208n:9540: Itimedhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe santike nidāne tathāgata parinibbānappavatti paridīpo ekūnatiṃsatimo saggo.
anya-e1208n:9541: Parinibbute bhagavati sahaparinibbānā brahmāsahampati imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi.
anya-e1208n:9545: Parinibbute bhagavati sahaparinibbānāsakko devānamindo imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi.
anya-e1208n:9548: Parinibbute bhagavati sahaparinibbānā āyasmā anuruddho imā gāthāyo abhāsi.
anya-e1208n:9553: Parinibbute bhagavati sahaparinibbānā āyasmā ānando imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi.
anya-e1208n:9833: Bhatyā punappuna mimaṃ sarataṃ sataṃ bho,
anya-e1208n:9911: Iti medhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadāna nidāne jinavaṃsadīpe santikenidāne bhagavato dhātuparinibbānappavattiparidīpo tiṃsatimosaggo.
